title: Essay on Criticism - the success of a work is

content.prompt: The speaker believes that the success of a work is achieved through

choices.label: qualities not immediately perceptible on the surface
the individual success of each of its component parts
the harmony among its parts, in spite of their individual weaknesses
an authorâ€™s capacity to conceal its most serious flaws

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
